plot: Janine's former drug dealer wants the money she owes; Curtis buys a handgun for safety; bullies harass Malik at school.

Blue, Janine's former drug dealer, demands that he receives the money that she owes him or he will threaten to harm the family. Meanwhile, another bully at Malik's school starts to harass him. But he finds Curtis' gun in the closet and soon believes that he's found the answer to his problem.—Anonymous
